channel.title: Comments on: This Week in Genesis (18 Mar 2016)
channel.description: The best new WordPress Genesis things

item.title: By: Nick Davis
item.dc:creator: Nick Davis
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://genesiswp.guide/2016-03-18/#comment-361">Tonya Mork</a>.
Thanks Tonya, my pleasure!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Tonya Mork.

Thanks Tonya, my pleasure!

item.title: By: Tonya Mork
item.dc:creator: Tonya Mork
item.description:
Nick,
I count on your guide to help me catch up with what's been going on. I think it's great how you turn the spotlight around and point it at the members of this awesome Genesis community.
Thank you for including Know the Code and me in your guide. I really appreciate it.
Cheers and Happy Coding, Tonya
item.content:encoded:
Nick,

I count on your guide to help me catch up with what’s been going on. I think it’s great how you turn the spotlight around and point it at the members of this awesome Genesis community.

Thank you for including Know the Code and me in your guide. I really appreciate it.

Cheers and Happy Coding,
Tonya

item.title: By: Graham Getty
item.dc:creator: Graham Getty
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://genesiswp.guide/2016-03-18/#comment-351">carrie dils</a>.
Yes. +1 Thanks for the roundup here. This was where I first learned about JT Grauke and Showcase-Pro. Just finished getting his theme all setup for my site over at https://resolvedllc.com/ after modifying and styling site title with Carrie's tutorial from 2014. Genesis community is such a great value add-on. So grateful. If I can ever pay it back with tips and tricks on using Raiser's Edge software from Blackbaud for fundraising, just say the word.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to carrie dils.

Yes. +1 Thanks for the roundup here. This was where I first learned about JT Grauke and Showcase-Pro. Just finished getting his theme all setup for my site over at https://resolvedllc.com/ after modifying and styling site title with Carrie’s tutorial from 2014. Genesis community is such a great value add-on. So grateful. If I can ever pay it back with tips and tricks on using Raiser’s Edge software from Blackbaud for fundraising, just say the word.
